<rect x="100" y="{y_offset}" width="863" height="{match_height}" fill="#fefefe" opacity=".9" rx="25" ry="25"/>
<text x="125" y="{y_offset + 35}" font-size="28" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Demi Cond" font-weight="500">{match.age_class.upper()} - {match.league.upper()}</text>
<text x="125" y="{y_offset + 80}" font-size="43" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Medium Cond" font-weight="100" >{match.home} {match.home_suffix}</text>
<text x="{125}" y="{y_offset + 125}" font-size="43" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Medium Cond" font-weight="100" >{match.away} {match.away_suffix}</text>
<text x="{width - 265}" y="{y_offset + 105}" font-size="46" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Medium" font-weight="800" text-anchor="middle">{match.home_score} : {match.away_score}</text>
<text x="{width - 265}" y="{y_offset + 135}" font-size="28" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Medium" font-weight="600" text-anchor="middle">{match.other}</text>
<text x="{width - 265}" y="{y_offset + 60}" font-size="28" fill="#0862aa" font-family="Franklin Gothic Demi Cond" font-weight="600" text-anchor="middle">{match.day} {match.time}</text>
